member.name: M:GeCli.Back.API.Controllers.CategoriesController.Get
member.summary: Return all categories registered in the database.

member.name: M:GeCli.Back.API.Controllers.CategoriesController.GetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a category queried by id.

member.name: M:GeCli.Back.API.Controllers.CategoriesController.Post(GeCli.Back.Shared.ModelView.Category.NewCategory)
member.summary: Insert new category

member.name: M:GeCli.Back.API.Controllers.CategoriesController.Put(GeCli.Back.Shared.ModelView.Category.UpdateCategory)
member.summary: Update an existing category.
member.remarks: When modifying a category, it will be permanently changed in the database.

member.name: M:GeCli.Back.API.Controllers.CategoriesController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete an existing category based on id.
member.remarks: When deleting a category, it will be permanently removed from the database.
